answers.answer: I'm 27 weeks and I've gained only 4 lbs and my Dr doesn't seemed concerned. They would tell you if they were.
I'm up 9 lbs, but I was pretty thin before I got pregnant.
I've gained 8lbs at 20 weeks along I think it just depends how you were during you first trimester with morning sickness or weight gain!

I gained zero weight with my daughter and I was so worried!!! My daughter reassured me that baby takes from mom. Not directly from what you consume. So baby will grow and thrive off of mama's fat storage and the only real time it's a super concern, is if the mother's pre-pregnancy weight is well below normal. So even if you were pretty thin to start, your baby will be fine unless mom's weight drops into an unhealthy weight range. Try eating Ben and Jerry's or other pack on the pounds foods a little more if you are super concerned. I'm not saying like all the time but whatever your favorite treat or not-so-good-for-you thing is, go for seconds! :) seriously though, unless you are getting into an unhealthy low weight range, baby is fine!!!
My doctor, not daughter reassured me. Lol!!!!
Am 24weeks and have gain 14=(
20 weeks. 4 lbs.

I'm 16 weeks and still 2lbs under my pre-pregnancy weight. I lost weight during the first trimester because of nausea. My doctor reassured me that everything is fine. If yours did too, I wouldn't worry!
20 weeks 4 lbs
I'm 26 weeks and -13 from my pre pregnancy weight. Lol my my baby is 2 weeks ahead of his weight. Weird
I am 18 weeks and 10 pounds under pre-pregnancy. I was a big girl before and didnt have any morning sickness
With my first I had gained about 18 lbs by 20 weeks. But this time around im still -22 lbs.
33 weeks. 11 pds.
20 weeks 5 lbs
25weeks about -3 lbs.

I've barely gained anything as well. I didn't even know how much I weighed prior but I'm still fitting into most of my old clothes (just filling them out better) so I'd say I haven't gained all that much. I'm pretty sure I gained more with my second by this time but I've also been in alot more pain and having bad migraines all the time and it makes me not want to eat as much as I probably should. That and money's tight so I'm super stressed.
I  had lost 23lbs. Now 26wks finally gained 6lbs.

I'm 28wks and I've gained 20lb I was thin now I'm just huge can't understand it not even eatin the amount I should really and its playing havoc on my back knee's hips and feet cos I'm not used to the weight
Pre pregnancy weight was 95lb im 5"3. 19 weeks now at my 15 week check up i was 105. So iv gained 15 pounds.
Have you been checked for gestational diabetes. That can cause weightgain during pregnancy and you dont ever of had to of had diabetes before it can come on during pregnancy

question: I'm just curious what everyone has gained by 20 weeks pregnant. I am still 1lb under what I was at my initial OB appointment but my doctor doesn't seem at all concerned about it.
title: weight gain at 5 months
